items.title: Security decorum
items.details: Use best grammar possible and keep a level temper while on duty. Report improper conduct to SD staff.

items.title: Territory restriction
items.details: Security should not leave Vault-Tec territory while on duty unless ordered. Mining is not permitted while on duty.

items.title: Jail time cap
items.details: Jail time cap is 15 minutes and must not exceed this unless waiting for Corporate to arrive.

items.title: Border procedure
items.details: Unauthorized player crossing border: warning shot, then lethal action may be taken if they continue.
